inn1.comm: he gets some bounce straightaway, Hafeez is tempted, he chases it outside the off stump
much better this time, he leaves it alone to the keeper
he sprays it wide outside the off stump, full and swinging away
strays towards the pads and he clips it off his hip down to fine leg
full and swinging in on the pads, he pushes it towards mid-off
lovely shot! Farhat watched it right through, the ball swung in from the off stump, he covered the movement and the line and merely pushed it through, beats mid-off
tucked towards the on side
lands it a touch wide outside off and he lets it go to the keeper
wow that was quite a pacy one, fired it on the blockhole on the of stump, digs it out well
lands it a touch outside off and he softly taps it back down the pitch
and again on the blockhole, swings away a touch late and he squeezes it out, good bowling with the new ball
not this one, he sprays it wide down the leg side
lot of pace on that but on the pads, easy for Hafeez as he flicks it in the air wide of midwicket
confident appeal for a lbw but it was missing leg, beaten for pace as he tried to flick it to the on side
he needn't have chased that, full and wide outside off and swinging away
didn't take too long for Shafiul to get his man! He pitched it a bit shorter outside off and got it to angle across, lured Farhat into cutting, it was in the air and straight to backward point
short of a length and he gets beside the line and defends
lands it on a good length outside off and he lets it go to the keeper
that was really close to a nick! Younis stood rooted to the crease and poked at one which seamed away a bit late, he ought to have left it
defends this one solidly
pushes this one down to cover
strays close to the pads and he flicks it in the air but drops short of midwicket
gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
shaped in and came very closer to shaving the off stump, Hafeez can thank his lucky stars
similar delivery but he gets beside it and taps it to the off side
for less than a second it seemed like he would suffer the same fate as Farhat, short and wide and he plays the square cut but he places it better, wide of backward point
leaves it alone to the keeper
steers it past backward point, third man mops up
that would have hit the tenth stump, too wide down the leg side
and another false shot outside off, feet rooted to the crease, good bounce and away movement
appeal for an lbw, looked like it landed outside the line of off stump, came in and it was hitting him down the leg side
gets across and clips it down to midwicket
fullish outside off and safely left alone
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
gets behind the line and defends
taps it down towards point
good placement and timing, a touch wide outside off, opens the face, keeps the ball down and places it wide of backward point
goes for the pull but miscues it, the ball drops behind square on the on side well clear of any fielder
swings in a bit late and he safely shoulders arms
tries to dab it to the off side but ends up chopping it onto the pitch
fullish in length outside off, he leaves it to the keeper
steers this down to third man
delivers from slightly wide of the crease and angles it in, defended to the off side
directed towards the pads, tucked through the line to mid-on
good length outside off and it holds its line before reaching the keeper
nudged softly to the on side, they take a quick run
swings it in late and he clips it softly to the on side
turned to the on side for a single
clipped down to the on side
that's a sharp bouncer! Really jumped off the surface, well taken over his head by Rahim
good length on the off stump, stays back and defends
fullish in length outside off and left alone to the keeper
lands it outside off and lets it go to the keeper
loses his radar and sprays it wide down the leg side
this time he strays wide outside the off stump, doesn't offer a shot
moves it inwards and shapes away after pitching, well left
gets forward and defends
softly defended on the front foot
turns it towards short fine leg
comes forward and defends to the off side
tucked towards midwicket
turns it just wide of short fine leg
strikes him on the pads but he's well forward, missing leg anyway
tries to knock it to the off side but gets an inside edge to the on side
driven on the up to sweeper cover, second single to Hafeez
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
that's an excellent shot, full and wide and he drives square, beats the diving point fielder
fullish in length outside off, left alone to the keeper
gets forward, turns the face of the bat and steers it to third man
gets well forward and defends
down the leg side, tries to sweep but misses
confusion there! Younis tries to sweep but fails to make proper contact, rolls to short fine leg and Younis attempts the run and then sends Hafeez back, Hafeez dives back at his crease
nudges to square leg
gets behind the line and defends
gets forward and pushes it to mid-off
forcefully played, chips down the track, takes it on a full length and clips against the turn to deep midwicket, really tests that fielder
taps it to the off side
clips it to the on side
knocks it down to long-on
commits forward and pushes it to long-on
lunges forward and pushes it to cover
comes down the track but ends up mistiming it to mid-on
comes forward and defends to cover
stays back and clips him down to deep midwicket
turns it towards midwicket
gives him a bit of width, rocks back and slices it elegantly past backward point, big gap in the deep
turns it towards midwicket
gets to the pitch of the ball and pushes it towards long-off
comes forward and drives, slight fumble by the bowler on the dive
cuts it down to point
gets well forward and defends
chips down the track and lofts it over extra cover
drives towards point and sets off, Sunny does well to srop it but can't prevent the single
defended towards point
commits forward and smothers the spin
spoons it towards cover but he plays it softly, drops well short of the fielder
tossed up outside off and pushed towards cover
tossed up outside off, gives time for Hafeez to get forward and place it in the gap at cover, well placed and timed
that really slipped out, he puts away a high full toss down to wide long-off
sweeps hard and that's an excellent save by Razzak at long leg
stays back and punches it to the off side
tossed and defended softly
stays back and taps it towards point
tossed up outside off and defended to the off side
gets forward and defends to the off side
drives but straight to cover
comes forward and turns it down to square leg
opens the face and steers him towards short third man
stays back and pushes it towards cover for a single

classic placement again, gets beside the line to a good length delivery, slices it wide of backward point, didn't hit it too hard, Shakib does well to dive at deep backward point but the ball deflects off his body and rolls to the rope
change of pace, change of luck! Hafeez loses concentration and falls to a very poor shot, fetches a short ball from outside off and gets a top edge that swirls to Kayes at mid-on, easy one
defends to the off side
full and he turns the face of the bat and clips it to midwicket, well fielded by Razzak
unfortunate for Bangladesh, direct hit from mid-off at the batsman's end deflects off the stumps and it's an overthrow
stay back and punches it to the off side
sprays it down the leg side
stays back and punches it to mid-off
drops it short, he rocks back and pulls, well fielded by Nafees at deep midwicket
punches it to long-off
goes on the back foot and defends
stays back and drops it to the off side
slices it straight to point, no swing on that occasion
gets behind the line and punches it towards mid-off
keeps it on the same line and length outside off, punched to point again
action replay, yet another punch to point, at least he's keeping him quiet
pushed to point again, enthralling, in hindsight they needn't have bowled this ball at all!
wide down the leg side again, seen a few of those today
goes back and punches back to the bowler
tossed up and defended again
goes for the square drive but intercepted at point
strays down the leg side and he gets a bit of wood on it and runs it down to fine leg, the fielder was up
appeal for a stumping, he defends forward, lunges in fact and the ball rolls back to Rahim, drags his foot back before he whips off the bails, it goes upstairs, he's safe
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
goes back and pulls him to long-on
comes well forward and smothers the spin
turns it to the on side
worked behind square and down to fine leg
loose shot but safe, gets a leading edge of sorts over cover
half hearted appeal, gets forward but the ball was missing leg
down the leg side and Rahim fails to stop it
makes room and dabs it to short third man
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
knocks it down to point
opens the face and dabs it to short third man
driven back to the bowler
yet another wide down the leg side
clips it behind square
drives on the up but well short of the bowler
full toss and swept, in the air for a while but drops short of fine leg
turn from the rough and that beats Younis
softly nudged to short fine leg

trapped in front! Lands on middle and the ball straightens, Younis stays at the crease and is trapped as the ball skids through and hits him in line with the stumps, the ball straightened and that foxed him
gets off the mark with a square drive to sweeper cover
quicker ball, squeezed to mid-on and they sneak in a quick single
chips down the track and checks his shot, places it to point, fires a throw to the keeper
defended towards cover
nudges it wide of short fine leg, another quick single
stays back and punches it against the turn to long-on
driven and Sunny misfields, allows a single
chips down the track and checks his shot
punched off the front foot but wide of Sunny and down to long-off
driven back to the bowler, Sunny is giving it a lot of flight
gets well forward and drives wide of midwicket, they take the first one quickly
stays back and punches it wide of cover
tossed down the leg side, nudged away
the arm ball that zips through! well played Umar for keeping it out or he would have been bowled through the gate
pushed to the off side
gets forward and defends
gets well forward and drives towards long-off
gets well forward and pushes a low full toss to deep midwicket
pushes a single to long-off
that's probably the 146th wide down the leg side today
punches it down to long-off
stays back and pounds this to long-on
stays back and slices it to sweeper cover
commits forward and defends
goes back and whips him across the line to midwicket
mid-on was up so Umar gave the charge, got to the pitch and lofted it cleanly over the fielder
chopped to the off side
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
comes well forward and defends
stays back and punches it to long-on
clips it to deep square leg
pushes him down to long-on
knocks it down to square leg
quick single to midwicket, Mushfiqur yells out to throw to his end
gets well forward and defends
better take cover! Tossed up on the off stump, clears the back leg and whacks it several rows over deep midwicket
pushes it down to point
gets well forward and drives to long-off
the reverse sweep, very nearly rolls over to the boundary but razzak does well to pull it back
goes back and pulls to long-on
he errs by pitching it short, he rocks back and slaps it wide of cover, beats the sweeper
goes back and knocks it to deep point
drives it back to the bowler
down the leg side and close to being called a wide
gets forward and pushes it down to long-on
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man
full and lots of width, driven down to the sweeper cover
fullish on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
cramps him up for room, he stays behind the line and defends down the pitch
fuller in length, he keeps it straight, defends again
gets on his knee and paddles him down to fine leg
stays back and punches him down to long-on
premeditated paddle, down to fine leg
stays back, waits for it and takes another easy single to long-on
clips him down to deep square leg
stays back and punches it to long-on
fullish on the offstump and driven down to long-off
on the blockhole outside off and jammed to the covers
fires it on the blockhole on middle, gives a bit of room and jams it out to the off side, well bowled
clears the back leg and carves it over the bowler's head, super-confident Misbah ran just one run thinking it would go to the boundary, it didn't even carry to the rope, nuff said..
fullish on the pads and clipped down to midwicket
breaks the shackles a bit, makes room to a delivery that's full and angling in on middle, smooth drive and well timed past mid-off and cover
shapes to drive straight but ends up pushing it to mid-on
quicker through the air and defended on the front foot
full and driven down to long-off
gets away with a full toss, ends up smashing it down to cover
makes room and squeezes this one to cover
full toss and Misbah finally gets one past the rope, clubs it over midwicket
clever shot, it was full and on the of stump, Umar adjusted late, opened the face of the bat and steered it just wide of the diving short third man fielder, that's his fifty
slashes this wide of backward point and it was speeding towards the rope again but Nasir Hossain does really well to cut it off
he bowls it short this time but it works against him as Umar stands tall and pulls wide of midwicket, the field's up, plenty of gaps
makes a bit of room and tries to slice him to the deep on the off side but he finds the fielder in the ring
pacy inswinging yorker but Umar's alert as ever to get his bat down and squirt it out to the off side
good delivery to fox Misbah, it was short outside off and really climbing on the batsman, Misbah ,moved across but couldn't decide whether to hook or not, he left it instead
loose shot in the end, tossed up on the off stump, Umar makes room and lofts but it's a half-hearted loft, Shafiul takes the skier easily at long-off plenty of yards in front of the rope
gets well forward and defends
defended down the track again
rocks back and pulls a flatter delivery but he finds mid-on
glides but can';t beat short third man
pulled but very well saved at midwicket, don't know for sure who the fielder was
width outside off and he angles it down to third man

slower ball and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to point and sets off direct hit at the batsman's end but he's safe, unfortunately for Bangladesh the ball deflects off the stumps and runs to the deep midwicket boundary
teases him with a slower ball outside off, he tries to cheekily steer it to third man but misses it completely
full and pushed down the ground to long-off, throw from Kayes was a bit wide
short and pulled down to square leg
short and pulled, good attempt by short midwicket to pull off a blinder but the ball just cleared him, two fielders give the charge but the ball wins
drills it down to midwicket
gets well forward and defends it
comes forward and drives him to long-off
comes well forward and pushes him down to cover and takes a quick single
Shakib does well to slide to his right and cut it off
full and driven down the ground to long-off
gets forward and drops this one down to cover
down the throat of long-on! Tossed up on middle, he makes a bit of room and tries to slam it down the ground but miscues it to Farhad (substitute), easily taken, that's the first ODI wicket for Sunny
quiet start for Afridi, defended on the front foot
one ball was enough to warm up, he makes a lot of room and chips down the track and lofts just over the rope at long-off
forces it to the on side
stays back and punches him down to long-on
stays back and punches it to long-on
no big hit, knocks it towards square leg
sharp turn and he angles it to point
knocks it towards point and sets off for a quick single
another quiet forward defence
gives Shakib respect again by getting forward to defend
punches it straight back to the bowler who flings the ball to the keeper, Malik was lucky he wasn't in the way
he opens the face and steers it to third man, over to Afridi again
wanted to bowl the slower ball but he ended up spraying it too wide outside off
Dropped Afridi has a life, Afridi checks his shot and ends up lobbing it to the bowler, Shafiul didn't see ready to take it in his follow through, gets a hand to it but spills it on the dive
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
he crashed that, full and wide outside off and he picks the gap at the covers, the quick outfield does the rest, the sweeper dives in vain
clips it to the on side
clean hit! Makes a bit of room and gives him the charge, picks it from the middle stump and sends it whistling over the sight screen
makes room and squeezes it out to the off side
slips it wide down the leg side
comes down the pitch and pushes it to long-on
makes room and crashes it to Tamim at cover
smacks a low full toss down to long-off

Malik tries to get too cheeky, he tries to dab a slower delivery down to third man but ends up getting a big outside edge, no problem for Rahim, the umpire took a bit of time to raise the finger, it was obvious
stays at the crease and steers it down to point
criminal, fine leg's up and he fires it on the pads at the pace Afridi likes, a gentle flick is enough to send it racing to fine leg
good comeback by the bowler, bangs it in short and fizzes on Afridi, he arches backwards and shapes to upper cut it but misses
slower ball and flicked to the deep for a single
Sarfraz gets a bouncer straight up, good one to the new batsman, he negotiates well by ducking under it
low full toss outside off he punches it down to long-off
comes forward and drives it down to sweeper cover
full and drilled down to wide long-on
sprays it down the leg side and he sweeps, fine leg mops up
chance for a run-out! Afridi squirts it to the on side and there's hesitation in the running, Sarfraz was miles out of his crease, Rahim picks up and takes aim but misses
squirts one to the on side
Rubel drifts down the leg side, easily nudged off the pads, beats the keeper and fine leg was nowhere to be seen
turns his wrists and picks a single to long-on
shapes to club it over the on side, mistimes it over square leg
bouncer rears up on him but he does well to drop it down to the off side
slower ball, he pushes it down to extra cover
short again and pulled away down to deep square leg
gets forward and pushes it down to cover
clears the back leg and ploughs it down to long-on
miscues the slog but it lands safely at midwicket
he fires it flat and Afridi gives room and whams it down to long-on, good mopping up at the boundary
opens the face and steers it to third man
makes room and clubs a low full toss to wide long-on, once again good fielding at the boundary by Mahmudullah
swivels and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket, they could have taken two but Afridi wants the strike
poor judgement by the fielder, Afridi smacks a full toss down to wide long-off, Rubel ran to his left but over-ran and couldn't stop the ball
makes room and Afridi times this one better, finds the big gap at deep extra cover
short and he miscues the pull, lands safely at deep midwicket
the slower ball foxes him, he clears the back leg and tries to heave him over the on side, top edge and Mahmudullah runs to short point and takes the catch
fullish and pushed to the on side

inn2.comm: tossed up on the off stump and pushes it to long-off
gets a half stride forward and tucks it to the on side
flatter and defended to the on side
stays behind the line and pushes it to the off side
gets a half stride forward and defends to the off side
tossed up outside off and knocked towards cover
kicks up on him off a good length and it hits his body and rolls away
strays on the body and he nudges behind square on the on side
lands it on a good length outside off and he gets across and shoulders arms
Gul drifts on the body again and he gets a bit of bounce, he tucks it down to fine leg
good length on middle and leg and easily tucked down to fine leg, he needs to keep it outside the of stump
just a shade down the leg side and wide called, Gul is consistently keeping it on that middle to leg line to the left-handers
lands it in the region on the off stump and he defends
gets forward and defends to the off side
comes forward and defends again
stays back and taps it down the pitch
tossed up on middle and leg, defended
flighted outside off and defended on the front foot
same old story, defended on the front foot
that's more like it from Gul, kicks up off a good length outside off and beats him
clipped down to the on side, quick single taken

Gul can thank his lucky stars he got a wicket with that, too wide outside, Tamim ought to have left it but he stayed at the crease and chased it, takes the outermost portion of the outside edge and Younis does really well to fall to his left and take it, Younis looks really amused
fullish outside off and driven past cover
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms
lands it outside off and he lets it go
defends this to the on side
comes forward and defends back to the bowler
comes forward and defends to the off side
drives towards cover
defends onto his boot
nicely timed, just a gentle push off the backfoot past backward point
now Kayes nearly feathers an edge, lands it outside of and gets it to shape away, he pokes at it and sarfraz does well to dive and catch it
stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
gets behind the line and pushes it towards cover
steered just wide of backward point, third man picks up
comes forward and defends, boring!
better,he chips down the track and checks his shot, flicks it behind leg slip

and I obviously spoke too soon about Hafeez! Kayes tries to do something different to get out of the rut, tossed up outside off and he comes forward to drives on the up, tamely chips it to short cover
gets across the stumps and defends
comes forward and defends again
stays behind the line and defends, Mushfiqur has to show the way here
gets beside the line and knocks it to third man
pushes this one towards point
stays behind the line and tucks it to the on side
tucks him up and he defends again
stays on the backfoot and pushes it to the off side
gets beside the line and knocks it to the off side
turns this one towards fine leg
stays back and punches this one down to mid-on, Nafees will face the spinner now
hits the pad as he gets forward to defend, pitched in line and was quite in line with the stumps, confident appeal
he gets him this time! Flatter delivery and Nafees prods forward to defend, wasn't too far from the inside edge but the umpire Cloete reckoned that was hitting the off stump
he goes back and the ball skids through, just manages to keep it out
quicker one again and he defends

another one bites the dust! Bit of extra bounce from Gul as he lands it outside off, Mushfiqur got beside the line but the ball flew off the shoulder of the bat down to Hafeez at gully. Hafeez has featured in the last three dismissals
turns this one down to gully
gets forward and pushes this one down to cover
nice fizzer from Gul, almost umplayable, outside off and Nasir pokes his bat out, beaten for pace
Nasir is determined to get off the mark no matter what, pitched up outside off and he flays at it off the front foot, just misses the outside edge
nips back in and he tucks it to the on side
skids through and straightens, he forces it back down the pitch
jabs at it outside the off stump
stays back and pushes it to long-on
hits his thigh pad and drops to the ground
Dropped Nasir was all at sea there, the ball turned back in too much for his comfort, leading edge travels to first slip, Younis couldn't get his hands under it, rolled to third man
steers this one towards backward point
goes back in his crease and drops it to the off side
exerts himself with that bouncer, fizzes over Shakib's head, the umpire penalises him
gets beside the line and knocks it down towards point
that really beats him all ends up, lands on middle and leg and angles away late, beats the outside edge, how do you play those?
gets across and defends to the off side
comes round the wicket and he gets forward and defends
gets forward and jabs at it down to cover
comes forward and the ball lobs off his pads and rolls to the on side
stays back, waits for the turn and defends
stays back and clips it with the turn to square leg
Shakib's circumspect with his footwork, exposes his off stump as he defends
gets well forward and defends, the boundary drought continues
pitches it on the off stump and Nasir gets across and defends
lands it outside off and shapes away, he shoulders arms
slants it across the right-hander and he safely lets it go
pitches it up this time and Nasir leans forward and pushes it through the line, beats mid-off and cover
clips it down to the on side
Tanvir comes round the wicket, gets nicely behind the line and defends, Nasir looks more confident now
goes on the backfoot and punches it down to long-off
one slip in place, comes well forward and defends softly
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
stays back and knocks it to the on side
comes forward and pushes it towards midwicket
round the wicket this time, played straight down the pitch
nice looking drive on the up but straight towards cover
gets across his stumps and flicks it behind square on the on side
Dropped comes round the wicket, the ball kicks up and Nasir flashes at it, thin edge and Sarfraz fluffs it, that was a sitter
comes round the wicket, he comes across the line and knocks it to the on side
stays rooted to the crease and knocks it towards cover
comes forward and defends
strays down the leg side
nudges it down to square leg
stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
stays back and chops it down to the off side
prods forward and gets a thick outside edge which beats second slip
gets across and pushes it to the off side
slashes at one short and wide outside off, actually not that wide, nearly edges it
bowls a low full toss, attempts a yorker, he pushes it down towards mid-off
goes across his stumps and clips it down to fine leg
makes room and chops it down to point
lunges forward and drives down to cover
stays back and punches it down to cover
he's shaping to slice it through the gap but finds point again
comes forward and drives to mid-off
gets forward and pushes it to extra cover, another Hafeez maiden
continues round the wicket, he stays back and clips it towards mid-on
driven down to mid-off and well fielded
slides this one wide down the leg side
he has the width to drive but he ends up slicing it straight to extra cover
gets across and clips him down to fine leg
stays behind the line and defends down the pitch
lashes at one wide outside off, he misses it
nearly takes the outside edge, gets forward and pokes at it
drifts on the pads, nudges it to the on side
gets forward and drives through the line to long-off
turns away and he chases at it and chops it down to sweeper cover
drives to the deep on the off side
tossed up on middle and off and drilled to long-on
this one swerves back in sharply and slices him in half, beats the edge and stumps
cuts this time but it goes straight to third man who is square
gets behind the line and pushes it to the off side
fullish in length on middle, he drives down the pitch and the ball hits the stumps at the other end
gets beside the line and chops it towards gully
drifts on the body, he shuffles a bit and the ball drops it to the on side
goes across his stumps and clips it to the on side
strays wide down the leg side
he tries to flick it to the on side, gets an inside edge onto his pad and the ball beats slip and rolls to third man, Afridi reckoned it hit pad first and appealed
defended to the off side
Dropped Hafeez this time, Shakib top edges a slog, Hafeez runs forward from deep square leg and times his dive well but the ball falls out of his had as he tries to cup it
gets forward and defends
drives on the up just wide of point
stays back and defends with soft hands
shuffles and clips it to square leg
tosses it up on the off stump, he turns it to short fine leg
turns it to the on side again
gets on his knee to sweep, the ball lobs off his glove and rolls to fine leg, third four of the innings
goes back at his crease and cuts to deep point
gets forward and defends to the off side
fires it really wide down the leg side
comes forward and pushes it down to long-on
tries to nudge it off his pads, the ball drops to the off side
stands back and steers it to the sweeper cover fielder, they run hard for the second
turns this one to the on side
rocks back at his crease and slaps it to deep point
comes forward and pushes it through the line to long-off
comes forward to drive but pushes it inside out to the off side
now he gets a leading edge that fortunately lands wide of the fielders on the off side, that';s the 50 stand - it's taken them twice the number of balls to get there
bowls a bit too short, he rocks back and slaps it past backward point, misfield there
turn and bounce, he doesn't offer a shot
goes back and punches it to long-on
pushes it towards deep point
cuts to point and the umpire gets in the way, caught napping probably
defended on the back foot towards the off side
quicker ball darting into the right-hander, defended on the back foot
pushed towards point from deep in the crease
pushed towards the off side once again
Hossain goes back and defends to midwicket
Hossain goes back and cuts through backward point
Hossain tries to slog Afridi across the line, and is beaten comprehensively
Hossain moves back and jabs at a quick one outside off, he gets a thick outside edge that runs to the third man boundary
short ball and Hossain goes back and pulls from outside off to deep square leg
driven to long off for a single
defended solidly on the front foot
it's the legbreak, but it's also a long hop. Hossain rocks back and heaves the ball into the gap between deep midwicket and long on
Ajmal bowls with a slight sling action just to mix things up a bit, the ball drops to the on side
punches it towards cover
he tries to slash and nearly edge to the keeper
foxed by the turn but he manages to defend
stays back and pushes it to the off side
squeezes it out to cover and takes a quick single
flighted outside off but driven straight to cover
driven to point and the ball goes right between Umar akmal's legs, he kicks the air in frustration
tossed up wide down the leg side
tucks it to the on side
stays back and punches it to the off side
cuts this one down to sweeper cover
goes back and cuts to point
sneaks through and nearly shaves the stump, hits his body and rolls away
gets forward and clips it to the on side
drives towards cover
comes forward anbd smothers the spin
he shoulders arms
tossed up outside leg, too wide
sharp turn and bounce, he somehow manages to keep it out
gets forward and drives to long-on
gets forward and drives on the up to cover
stays back and chops it to the off side
beaten for the turn, Sarfraz whips off the bails
gets forward and pushes it down to point
makes room to cut and misses, Shakib is frustrated
full and driven straight to cover
makes room, waits for the turn and cuts to point
pushes it through quicker, he turns it towards square leg
gets forward and clips it to the on side
flights it on the off stump, he leans forward and drives to sweeper cover
gets turn and bounce from round the wicket, stays back and tucks it to the on side
chops it down the pitch
gets well forward and knocks it to the on side
stays back and defends with soft hands
tosses it up and invites the drive, he drives straight to sweeper cover
stays back and defends with soft hands
cuts just wide of backward point
steers it towards point but decides against the single
comes round the wicket and strikes his pad, seemed like a good shout but it was missing off stump I think
he's squared up by the turn, he gets an inside edge down to fine leg, the 100's up
tucks it to the on side and they scamper through for a single
stays back and chops him down to deep point
defends and the ball lobs off the pads, Sarfraz goes for the catch and fails to pick it up but I don't know if he edged it
comes forward and the ball clips his body and rolls to the off side
lands outside leg and hits his pads
comes down the track to loft but he gets an inside edge to the on side
slides it down the leg side poor start after drinks, down the leg side and he nudges it away
stays back and defends back to the bowler
defends back to the bowler
works it towards cover
gets forward and smothers the spin
he gets his fifty! A very watchful one indeed, he stays back, waits for the turn and cuts just wide of the point fielder, nobody in the deep
clips it to the on side
stays back and taps it to the off side
stays back and steers it towards point
tossed up on the off stump, he gets well forward and defends back to the bowler
goes back and cuts down to point
that's the umpteenth wide down the leg side today
brings up the 100 run stand with a neat cover drive, pitched up, he drive against the spin
tossed up and he gets forward to defend, ball lobs off the pad
gets well forward and defends
flatter delivery, gets well forward and defends
tossed up on middle and leg, he hoicks it to the on side, the sweeper picks it up
cuts it down to point
comes down the track, changes his mind and depends
turns this to the on side
fires it short on seeing him advance, misses and sarfraz whips off the bails, he just about drags his foot back
stays back and pulls, beats short fine leg
comes forward to block, the ball lobs off the pads
stays back and cuts towards point, quick single
the offspinners continue bowling from round the wicket, he goes back and cuts
softest of dismissals, quite an irony considering the way he had been playing for the last hour, he shapes to pull against the turn, ends up giving catching practice to Ajmal
tucks it to the on side
gets forward and clips it down to fine leg
tossed up on middle and off and he pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and drives to the off side
goes forward and gets a leading edge wide of point
tossed up and he squeezes it out to the on side
comes forward and pushes a single in front of mid-off
stays back and punches it down to long-on
gets forward and squeezes it past the bowler down to long-on
gets forward and the ball lobs off his pads to the on side
pushes it just wide of point for a single
drops it short and he rocks back, swivels and clubs it over midwicket
comes forward and clips it down to square leg
the straighter one, gets forward and defends
the straighter one again, beats him this time and he whips off the bails
gets well forward and defends
lands it outside off and he slashes at it, lucky not to get an edge
stays at the crease and he miscues the pull down to deep midwicket
comes down the track to slam it over his head but he misses it, Tanvir drops it a bit short
stays back and clips it down towards mid-on
lands it outside off and he leaves it alone to the keeper
gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
gets beside the line and taps it towards cover, Hossain charges out of his crease and he's sent back, the throw was wide of the stumps
gets beside the line and taps him down to point
short and he fetches it from over his shoulder and biffs it towards cow corner
that rocketed off the bat, pitched up outside the off stump, had a lot of width to work with, spanked past the covers
another bouncer and he flat-bats it down to deep midwicket
steers it down to third man for a single
full and wide and he drives past the covers, Hafeez slides at deep cover and stops it
angles it on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
comes round the wicket and gives him width, he reaches out and places it down to third man
angles it on the body and he clips him down to deep square leg
full and wide outside off, he reaches out and gets an outside edge that beats the wicketkeeper
bowls it full and he clears his back leg and thuds it down the ground down to long-on
dabs it with soft hands and he sets off for a quick single, Gul picks the ball up to the right of the pitch and aims at the bowler's end, direct hit would have had him
Nasir goes for the hook but the bouncer was too good for him, that's one for the over
hoicks him across the line, finds midwicket, no single taken
he oversteps! Nasir goes for a wild swing off a pitched up ball and misses, he has another chance as it will be a freehit
Freehit The slower ball and he swings over midwicket, miscued but it lands in the middle of nowhere
slower ball, he opens the face and dabs it to third man and retains the strike
tosses it up and he gives the charge and slams it over extra cover! Just over the rope and that takes him to 92
this is giving this crowd something to cheer! Drops it short and he rocks back and slashes it past backward point
gets forward and drives to cover
fortuitous but he gets there! Chips down the track and gets an outside edge that beats the keeper, no slips, down to third man, at least Nasir goes home happy and well done to him!
defends this one back to the bowler
Mahmudullah makes some room to a full delivery and slashes this one over backward point
slower all, he dabs it down to point and sets off
his vigil ends and it's been some resistance, he upper cuts a short delivery down to third man, if only he stayed right till the last ball
clips it behind square or a single
he bowls it full and on the stumps, Razzak has a free swing and the ball crashes on the leg stump
Sunny safely taps his first ball in ODI cricket down to point
